E1.name: Language Understanding Failure
examples: Interpreted 'book a table for 2' as 'book 2 tables'
Confused 'cheap' restaurant with 'Chinese' restaurant
Missed negation: 'I don't want Indian food'

E2.name: Refusal to Answer
E2.description: Inappropriate refusal despite ability to help
examples: Refused to provide restaurant recommendations claiming privacy concerns
Declined to help with booking citing unclear policies
Said 'I cannot help with that' for a valid request

E3.name: Incorrect Retrieval
examples: Provided wrong address for the restaurant
Gave incorrect operating hours
Listed wrong amenities for a hotel

E4.name: Retrieval Failure
E4.description: Failed to retrieve any relevant information
examples: Could not find any restaurants matching criteria
Failed to look up booking confirmation
No results returned when results exist

E5.name: System Error
examples: Response was cut off mid-sentence
API timeout during booking
Database connection failure

E6.name: Incorrect Routing
examples: Hotel query handled by restaurant module
Taxi request processed as train booking
Wrong skill or intent triggered

E7.name: Out-of-Domain
examples: User asked for medical advice in restaurant bot
Request for services not offered
Question about topics outside bot's knowledge
